## Technical Details

### Model Configuration
- **Model:** `google/gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview` (Nano Banana)
- **Provider:** OpenRouter API
- **Aspect Ratio:** 1:1 (1080x1080px for Instagram)
- **Format:** PNG
- **Total Tokens:** 7,760 across all 5 images

### Generation Process
1. Design specs read from `POST_05_DESIGN_SPECS.md`
2. Prompts engineered and stored in `post_05_prompts.json`
3. Custom generation script created: `generate_post_05.py`
4. Sequential generation with 3-second delays (rate limit respect)
5. All images saved as high-quality PNG files

### API Performance
- **Success Rate:** 100% (5/5)
- **Average Generation Time:** ~3 seconds per image
- **Total Generation Time:** ~15 seconds (plus 12 seconds rate limit delays)
- **No retries needed:** All images passed quality on first attempt
